body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dnCWvahr*CovnM0nB*9iF1AGoAdaoJB3q3zTD97fF6nzE-QumWiDOOyvOB9QWRmdvOJmJ6u2aYdt4K6vywPPojZ9-hogVJzh/Canvasat140016.png)Helloo Guys  As illustrated in this image HB galzing ByRation component creates unwanted interior windows which I don't understand. I only want a south oriented window but for some reason I get northen interior windows (perimeter interior zone is set to 0.5m) This analysis is required to illustrate illuminance only . I guess I don't need to provide interior zones in this case thank you all
topic: glazing based on ration creating unwanted windows In HB v 0.0.53
